i18n.key: Notification sent during the closing of the inquiry.
The folder for the "Requests" module where new requests will be saved. If left blank, requests will be saved at the module's root in the administration interface.
Notification sent when the requester sends a new message.
Notification sent when one of the recipients sends a new message.
These are the groups and/or users authorized to answer requests submitted through this form.
A secure form can only be filled in by authenticated users.
This task identifies the workflow to launch for each request created through this form.
